recommendation: On 28 September 2017, the Commission recommended that the Secretary for Transport update and restructure CAR Part 171 to include the wider scope of technology, software and navigation aids that are normal for a modern air navigation service and to make provision for the rule to cater for future changes in technology.
safety_issue: Airways' digital data network did not have the resilience necessary to support an ATC service.

recommendation: On 28 September 2017, the Commission recommended that the Secretary for Transport update and restructure CAR Part 171 to include the wider scope of technology, software and navigation aids that are normal for a modern air navigation service and to make provision for the rule to cater for future changes in technology.
safety_issue: The CAA did not have the appropriate capability to determine independently if the Airways ATN would perform as the rules required.
